segments.text: I'd like to make a reservation to Los Angels for next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a second and I'll check the schedule .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll need an economy ticket with an open return .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: American Airlines has a flight leaving at 9:25 a . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that's OK . What time should I check in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to be there two hours before departure time .
segments.speaker: S2
